topic: Topic: Questions about exmatriculation and exam registration

correspondence.message: Is it possible to take exams in the winter semester 2024/25 if I have not achieved the necessary ECTS and am only exmatriculated at the end of the semester?"

Unfortunately, if you have an EN in your study plan, you can no longer register for exams. Therefore, you will no longer be able to take exams in the winter semester 2024/25 if you receive the ENB notice.
